replies.body: Huntress Sivir...WHAT!!!

First off, I'd like to thank Riot again for offering these sales every month at the expense of their own profit. One thing I have to say is that I remember French Maid Nidalee going on sale very recently, probably in the past 6 months at least. Am I hallucinating, or do rioters love that skin's personality too?

They get a bigger profit when they do go on sale. I miss the times where right when skins were released they would be on sale for the week after release. I personally dislike these "early" sales even though they are not early at all.
Why is Huntress Sivir in here? She is suppose to only be available through the bundle
Cosmic Reaver Kassadin? Shadowfire Kind? No? Ok.
I feel you, been waiting for that Kassadin skin for months...
For me I want Dark Star Varus though that will take awhile for a sale to come for that skin.
Got it from Hextech. Brought Varus instantly and enchanted the shard. That skin is amazing!

I need to roast riot so much for reseting the secret shop... I had pool party {{champion:154}} in it... I {{summoner:6}} to gamestop like sanic and got a card. When I got home - "MAINTENANCE" 1 day later - "SHOP RESET"
You can email them. They said they will honor the discounts they originally gave you.
I had Mecha Kha'zix -70% and 1 day later, Kha'zix -30% {{sticker:sg-janna}}
cant you contact support for the change?
The shop was reset, I got bad luck in the second chance. I don't think Riot would do anything about this.

If you had a discounted offer you would like to redeem from your shop before it refreshed, you can contact Riot Games Support via https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new -
 then login, choose request type "issue with personal shop/offers", fill out the remaining information, submit and you're good to go.

I didn't even get to see what my first one was, because my client freaked out and is currently saying "lolclient.exe - bad image"

I really wanted to know what I would've gotten...{{sticker:sg-janna}}
If you contact support, then they might be able to tell you.
It's been 2 years and I'm still waiting for Spirit Fire Brand.

Me too. But they've put alot of new stuff on sale, both champs and skins.

Maybe Spirit Fire Brand will go on sale in November. Hopefully along with Snowday Bard and Gravelord Azir.

whens thisss???^^^

FRELJORD TALIYAH? REALLY?

1 MONTH AFTER I DECIDED TO STOP WAITING???





google search: how to become addicted to alcohol
Sucks to be you B)  I've waited forever for this skin and never gave up hope on getting that sweet discount.
Same. My friend got it in his shop though for 70% off. Lucky guy!

this month by far has the most (good)epic skin discounts on it.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

They've updated their sales to include alot of skins released last year. 

I'm looking forward to getting alot of these for myself.
at least 6 months after release
save up and buy it with RP, buying champs on sale on newer accounts are ok, but as long as you have 20 champs or above, i recommend not buying them with RP unless absolutely necessary.
Jhin finally going on sale??? Is this Riot being generous??{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Kindred finally on sale for the first time - coolio
So is bewitching tristana not going up for sale? Or do they put the halloween/harrowing skins on the week of halloween?

Bewitching Tristana is a Harrowing Legacy skin. They don't go on sale individually. They are some times included in bundles.

However it will be available for purchase in a month's time when Harrowing starts.
Huntress Sivir? Is the bundle going on sale or is she going in the store?
Huntress Sivir?  Are you sure?

Thank you. Thank you so much for putting new champs and skins on sale.

Looking forward to picking up many of these gems. Thank you Riot.
{{champion:24}} ?
I have been waiting for some Jax skins for a while now... Jax the champ hasn't gone on sale either... what's wrong rito?
He's only 1350 IP. You can easily get him, don't need to spend RP.
I got him.. Have had him for awhile.. I want the skins..
I call bullshit. Talon never went on sale and the last sales for the month just came out. Wtf rito ples
Neither did Kennen
When is so-called early sales?
Yo, rito, where's my Slayer Jinx skin? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
When are the early sales?
{{champion:92}} no skin for me :(
